game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EightPawnGame

    public abstract class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class of Game acts like an interface between the classes in the board package -representing the board and the pieces on it- and the game designed, opening a simpler way to write new games.
    Author:
    cahid

      • getBestMoveForNextPlayer

        public Move getBestMoveForNextPlayer(int searchDepth)
        Used to initiate a monte-carlo-search-tree to find a good move
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Score maximizing move

      • runRandomMoveTree

        public void runRandomMoveTree(int nofBranches,
                              int treeDepth,
                              int currentDepth)
        Used to check whether the updating-reversing loop works by making random moves.
        Parameters:
        nofBranches - Number of child nodes of every node
        treeDepth - Depth of the seatch tree
        currentDepth - Used to keep track of depth of the recursive call. Should be set to 0 by default when calling the method.

      • getScores

        public abstract int[] getScores()
        Used to access the score states of the players
        Returns:
        Scores of the players
